ygData.subject: Re: Enchanters and Research (Bersker Str)
ygData.msgSnippet: I m amazed you could get spells through on a Griffon or HG at that level. Both of these are level 30+ monsters. Accordingly I wouldn t think a level 18-20
ygData.messageBody:
I'm amazed you could get spells through on a Griffon or HG at that level. Both of these are level 30+ monsters. Accordingly I wouldn't think a level 18-20 group should be able to get one spell through. Certainly with my Wizard if it's more that a couple levels higher than me I don't even bother casting as it will get resisted fully.

Unless I misread your post, I think it only prudent that Verant change this. There's no way a group of 18-20 lvl players, regardless of class, should be taking down monsters that are double their level. That's a tad extreme.

Trev

-----Original Message-----
From: Juan Custer [SMTP:JuanC@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 9:10 AM
To: 'EQ_spell_research@onelist.com'
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Enchanters and Research (Bersker Str)

From: Juan Custer <JuanC@...>


He he, good luck. Apparently Verant decided Whirl was too powerful
and they downgraded it. They've been doing it quietly to one server at a
time and it hit Karana last night. My Enchanter friends noticed an
IMMEDIATE difference when they logged in, with Whirl now being resisted 35%
of the time by blues and going up with each monster level.

also expect LifeDrain to start being resisted hardcore in the near
future. I grouped with four other 18-20th level Necromancers and we could
kill a Griffin easily, though a Hill Giant was still quite in the danger
zone (ie first time it killed all the pets and one necro, second time we
ran, third time we killed it). Personally I don't see how nasty this is
simply because I gained like MAYBE an eighth of a bubble of XP per griffin
kill, and there was tons of waiting. I just wanted to see if I could do it,
and now its time to go back to Oasis killing crocs. ;)

Malark on Karana

> -----Original Message-----
> From: kahlan@... [mailto:kahlan@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 9:48 AM
> To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ_spell_research] Enchanters and Research (Bersker Str)
>
>
> From: kahlan@...
>
> >Date: Tue, 18 May 1999 18:59:02 -0400
> >From: "Fondain De'Illusion" <Fondain@...>
> >Subject: Lil bit from an Enchanter
> >Just a lil point,
> >I have watched a group of lvl 16 necros kill sand giants....
> Ok, thats
> fine, but here is what irks me. I realize that as an
> enchanter I am not
> >expected to do the offense like wizards, magicians or even
> necros, Our
> prime directive is debuffing and buffing and we get some incredible
> >spells. Here are my rants.
>
> I am a 20th level enchanter and I solo all the time, I
> simply use my pet
> and whirl the creatures with no problem. I have been soloing
> since level
> 8th. Granted level 15th and 19th were hard with only a 12th
> and 16th level
> pet, but I made it. I do believe that groups will appreciate
> you more once
> you get the whirl till you hurl spell. I have people swear
> to me that they
> would rather fight with a enchanter vs wizard anyday due to
> the fact that
> they can whirl and have a pet.
>
> >1. we don't get enought buff or debuff that only WE have.
> Why do other
> classes get beserker str? Thats unbeknownst to me.
>
> You are incorrect Ber. Str is available to enchanters as a 20th level
> research spell. I confirmed this with a 30th level
> enchanter. (I came
> across a spell list that had the spell and couldn't find it
> anywhere, I
> then decided to ask the 30th level enchanter if they had it,
> they did, they
> researched it).
>
> >2. Ok, i can understand perhaps them resisting our offensive
> dmg spells
> but how are we supposed to be a group debuffer if they resist all >our
> spells? Even after using tashan or tashanii which also have a
> tendency to
> get resisted? Kinda makes us useless in that regard eh?
> >Just a few things im kinda irked about...
> >
> >Fondain De'Illusion, Master Enchanter of the Amber Knights, Tarew Mar
>
> I honestly believe all mage classes have this problem of
> monsters resisting
> spells. I was fighting a DW Croc yesterday at full health
> and full mana.
> I almost died. I lost my pet (20th level) and had 3 resisted
> sanity warped
> spells (92 points of damage currently) and 5 resisted whirl
> till you hurl.
> I had to rely on a kind necro for the help to kill it in the
> end. BTW the
> DW Croc was blue to me, I rarely ever cast a tashen spell. I
> find that I'm
> just as sucessful with it as without it.
>
> Do not sell yourself short. Enchanters are amoung one of the
> most powerful
> classes out there, on the otherhand also one of the most
> difficult to play.
>
> Just my 2 coppers worth for you.
>
> To all out there, this might of been a tad bit off topic. But
> I did mention
> the research part about bersker Str. 8)
>
> Safe journey to all and Good Luck.
>
> Kahlan 20th Level Enchanter (High Elf)
> Master Enchanter of Clan MacLear
> Xegony Server
>
